mapper.select:
SELECT cr.CRERULE_ID , cr.DOCURULE_FID, cr.REMARKS, cr.DEBIT, cr.CREDIT, cr.CRERATE, cr.ACCOUNTID,
hr.HELPRULE_ID, hr.CRERULE_FID , hr.BANKACCOUNT, hr.DEPART, hr.EXPENDITURE, hr.ACCOUNTING, hr.MAINCASH, hr.FLOWCASH, hr.BANKACCOUNTID, hr.DEPARTID, hr.EXPENDITUREID, hr.ACCOUNTINGID, hr.MAINCASHID, hr.FLOWCASHID, hr.rowindex FROM crerule cr INNER JOIN helprule as hr ON hr.CRERULE_FID = cr.CRERULE_ID WHERE cr.DOCURULE_FID = #{docurule_id}
